name: useDisposableRef
desc: Allows to call any cleanup/dispose functions on Singletons saved inside of useRef hook.

name: useFormField
desc: Simple Record wrapper around useFocusNode and useTextEditingController hooks.

name: useInterval
desc:
Periodically trigger a callback when duration elapses
Callback can be changed during the lifecycle, which it refresh the timer
Make sure that it's memoized correctly

name: useLocale
desc:
return locale from Localizations provider
Throws in case Localizations provider is not found within the widget tree scope

name: useNavigatorPop
desc: Simple wrapper around Navigator.of(context).pop(); with generic return type support

name: useOnMount
desc: Calls a provided callback after widget mounts into widget tree.

name: useOnMountHaptic
desc: Wrapper hook around haptic_feedback library. Provides a haptic feedback when widget mounts.

name: useOnPostFrameMount
desc:
Calls a provided callback after widget mounts into widget tree.
Difference between useOnMount is that provided callback is wrapped inside addPostFrameCallback callback

name: useOnUnmount
desc: Calls a provided callback before widget is unmounted from widget tree.

name: usePeriodicRerender
desc:
Periodically rerenders widget by internally incrementing useState value.
Note that duration value can't be changed during the lifecycle of this hook.

name: usePostFrameEffect
desc:
Simple wrapper around useEffect hook. The only difference that inner callback is wrapped inside addPostFrameCallback.
Note that since we are wrapping our callback inside addPostFrameCallback, there is no cleanup function support.

name: useRefValue
desc:
Simple wrapper around useRef, but emitting value instead of ObjectRef.
Use this in case you want a singleton instance of some class or other data structur.

name: useRerender
desc: Forces widget rerender by internally incrementing useState value.

name: useSyncedRef
desc:
Automatically synchronizes changing value into useRef hook.
Usefull in case you want to save some derived data inside of useRef, keeping previous value, etc..

name: useTimeout
desc: Trigger a callback when duration elapses

name: useValueChangedCallback
desc:
Automatically calls a provided void callback when value changes.
Callback is not fired during the initial render.

name: useValueChangedHapticFeedback
desc:
Wrapper hook around haptic_feedback library. Provides a haptic feedback anytime provided value changes.
Doesn't get called on initial render.
